Thanks for your submission

We'll carefully review your submission and if it looks like it's Less Mess, we'll post it to the site. If you left your email, we'll let you know, too (and we won't send you any other junk mail).

We're a work in progress

This site doesn't take any fees or payment for recommendations, it's simply a list of products and services we know work well for normal people who just want to make Less Mess in the world.
